dialog.message: Hello there! Welcome to Hira!
Thank you for accepting our request.
My name is Ryor. And I am one of your teachers for this game.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: But before teaching you about hiragana, we'll give you an idea how this game works.
Hello! I am Gema. Also one of your teachers.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: The first part of the game is the training phase.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: The first part of the training phase is the learning area. The learning area is the one on the map with the plus sign on it. Here, we will teach you the romaji for the hiragana characters.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: After teaching you, we will ask you when you can finish the whole level. Meaning from here to the dungeon! Don't worry, it doesn't have much bearing anyways.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: We just want to learn how much time it will take for you to learn best. You could also change it by entering the learning area again.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: You have to train to be able to move to the next area. The training area is the one with the pencil on it. The training area helps you memorize the syllables that you recently learned.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: There are multiple choice and matching type traning. You have to at least finish one to get to the next level.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: The next part is the practice area. It is the one with the up arrow on it. There, you can practice all the syllables that you learned.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: We will be showing you a character, then you have to type its romaji that we taught you. It is very similar to what you will be doing in dungeons.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Don't worry. We'll be holding back as to not hurt you. We'll only show one hiragana character at a time.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: But we will be asking every syllable that you know. So the more syllables you learned, the harder it will be.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: This is to prepare you for the next phase. The testing phase or the dungeon!

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: Here, we'll be doing actual battles where you can win or lose!

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: You will be battling goblins. It is similar to our practice but these goblins are ruthless!

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: They will be showing words instead of just a single hiragana character. Words that may contain every syllable we taught you.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: There are four golbins per dungeon. 3 of them asks 3 questions while the last one asks 5.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: You can decrease/increase the number of question by one. You just have to pick easy/hard in the dungeon before going to battle.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: In here, there are a few assists that you can use.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: You can skip, extend time, or even ask for some choices for your answer.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: We'll be tracking most of your progress here! So don't rush it and do your best!

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: After the dungeon, you will unlock the next character family. And you'll be training and testing for it again.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: It gets pretty difficult on later levels so be sure to review your characters! Train, Practice, or even just look at them in the Review screen!.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: If you are confused on which level you should be playing, you can click the Story button in the main menu.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: The latest level will be flashing red!

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: That's all for now. We'll see you around. We hope you enjoy your stay!
